lu.uni.geko.test
Class Tester

java.lang.Object
  lu.uni.geko.test.Tester

public final class Tester
extends Object

A utility class for functionality needed by developers for testing GeKo, a generic model weaver, and its extensions.

Constructor Summary
private Tester()
          Utility classes should not have a public or default constructor.

Method Detail

getModelURIsFromFolder

public static Quintuple<org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI,org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI,org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI,org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI,org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI> getModelURIsFromFolder(org.eclipse.core.resources.IFolder folder)
Determines and returns the baseMURI, pointcutMURI, adviceMURI, pc2AvMappingMURI, and wovenArchetypeMURI for the given folder if it conforms to the testing naming conventions (i.e. the values of the constants defined in GeKoConstants).

Parameters:
folder - the folder containing the models for testing
Returns:
the found (baseMURI, pointcutMURI, adviceMURI, pc2AvMappingMURI, wovenArchetypeMURI)

getURIIfNotYetSet

private static org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI getURIIfNotYetSet(org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI uri,
                                                                 org.eclipse.core.resources.IResource resource,
                                                                 org.eclipse.core.resources.IFolder folder,
                                                                 String modelName)
Determines whether the given URI variable is not yet set. Returns the URI of the model for the given resource if this is the case and throws a RuntimeException otherwise.

Parameters:
uri - a URI variable to be checked whether set or not
resource - the resource for which the URI should be determined
folder - the containing test folder (for debugging output)
modelName - the name of the model (for debugging output)
Returns:
the URI of the model for the given resource

assertWovenMRootEqualsWovenArchetypeMRoot

public static void assertWovenMRootEqualsWovenArchetypeMRoot(org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI wovenMURI,
                                                             org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI wovenArchetypeMURI)
Asserts that the models at the given URI are equivalent by throwing a RuntimeException if this is not the case. The equivalence considers unordered references as equal even if they contain the same elements in different order.

Parameters:
wovenMURI - the URI of the newly woven model
wovenArchetypeMURI - the URI of the old woven model serving as archetype
